name: SUPER BOT (itch)
description:
Take part in the adventures of "SUPER BOT", an action adventure game from a third person perspective. The main character is a cute robot, which, due to the domination of the industrial planet by nasty bugs, sets out to fight to regain energy and save his friends. On the way you will chase worms, discover the secrets of the industrial planet and fight the guardians to regain energy and save your friends. Features and functions of the game:
- Pleasant and addictive gameplay.
- Beautiful 3D graphics.
- Balanced difficulty level.
- Ability to play via the Xbox controller.
- Low minimum hardware requirements. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: MINIMUM: Operating system: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: AMD FX 8300 / Intel Core i5 2400 or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470 DirectX: Version 11 Disk Space: 5 GB of available space Sound card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card or higher RECOMMENDED: Operating system: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 or better DirectX: version 12 Disk Space: 5 GB of available space Sound card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card or higher
